attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Homeless should be given every opportunity to get out of there situation.

This petition is to give the homeless a chance to help themselves gain money by the means of working.

At the moment most local councils will not let them trade without a licence.

I would like the government to give every homeless person who has been living rough for a set period of time to the right to trade for a perod of time to enable them to make money to assist  them to get off the streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
